```{r}
library(feather)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
df <- read_feather('data/transform/mxm_dataset_test.feather')
```


```{r}
colnames(df)
```


```{r}
first_song_top_20 <- data.frame(words=colnames(df[1, 2:21]),
                                count=as.numeric(df[1, 2:21]))

ggplot(first_song_top_20, aes(words, count)) + geom_col()
```
